context_bundle.summary: PhiSync: Multi-agent coordination protocol for PhiVector infrastructure. File-based IPC (mandatory), async messaging, JSON serialization, correlation IDs for request/response. Prevents blocking across DC/VSCC/KALIC/WEBC/CMDC.

onboarding.quick_start: PhiSync = file-based IPC (agents can't communicate directly). Patterns: Command queue (real-time) or state file sync. Use correlation IDs for responses. JSON for human-readable serialization.
common_patterns: Command queue: agent writes JSON file, others poll/watch
State file sync: Periodic write of current state
Dead letter queue: Failed messages moved to error folder

known_errors.error: Message lost, agent never received it
known_errors.cause: File read before write completed, or file deleted prematurely
known_errors.solution: Use atomic writes (write to .tmp, rename to .json), implement retry logic
known_errors.prevention: Dead letter queue for failed processing
